name: Intro to Vulpinian Skies
landing_text: A treatise on how to smoothly get started with the $(bold)Vulpinian Skies$(reset) lifestyle.$(br)$(br)(Work in Progress)

macros.$(machinery): Hover over the munition above and press [$(k:jei.showRecipe)] to see $(bold)required machinery$(reset).
macros.$(workbench): Crafted via $(bold)sequenced assembly$(reset). Hover over the frame above and press [$(k:jei.showRecipe)] to see $(bold)required components and process$(reset).
macros.$(apparatus): Crafted via $(bold)Enchanting Apparatus$(reset). Hover over munition above and press [$(k:jei.showRecipe)] for more information$(reset).
